body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to us at Speedy Cars. My name is Ethan Hayes. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Gloria Perry.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Gloria. Before we proceed, could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, four two three, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. For security purposes, could you also verify the last four digits of your social security number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's zero two three five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Gloria. I have noted down your information. Is there anything specific you'd like assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling excited about purchasing a new car, but I have some concerns about the pricing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Gloria. Let's work together to address your pricing concerns. Thank you for providing your details and sharing your thoughts. We appreciate your time.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time and have a wonderful day, Gloria. Goodbye!
